posts.post_content: wow wizards can go to hell. just because people can't beat caw blade they ban a card. if you keep loosing to caw blade then you suck... i got my mystics when they first came out for some fun with a kor deck. when i got more serious i ran naya with vengevines. after alara rotated out i added the full see set of mystics and swords to the deck list.
